testcase.classname: Add Products to Cart in General Store App
testcase.name: Add two products to the cart and verify the total amount
testcase.system-out: Given I open the General Store app..........................................passed When I select 'Egypt' from the country dropdown.............................passed And I enter 'Hussam' in the name field......................................passed And I select 'Male' as the gender...........................................passed And I click on the 'Let's Shop' button......................................passed And I add two products to the cart..........................................passed Then I navigate to the cart screen..........................................passed And I verify that the products are displayed................................passed And I verify that the total amount equals 100.00............................passed
